tabs.label: Overview
tabs.template: The visa for you and your family will be arranged by Mobiquity, to ready more about visa go to the Links tab The HR department will contact with you to collect all needed documents. Make sure that you have following documents ready to share with the HR department: List of documents. In the second tab page you can find documents needed to apply for a visa for your family

tabs.label: Docs
tabs.template:
• or ID Document
    Copy including pages with stamps
  • Marriage certificate
    In english and apostilled
  • Birth certificate
    In english and apostilled
  • Antecedents certificate
    Signed

tabs.label: Links
Overview
tabs.template:
In the links section you can find a guide book how to find an appartment in the Netherlands.
You can find there following topics which will help you to find a perfect house:

  • Suitable Neighbourhoods
  • How to get the opportunity to see a house
  • What should you keep in mind when choosing a house
  • Tips & Tricks for house hunting


On the Dutch house rental market is also a lot of scam so be aware about that. There are no occasions! If something is cheaper than average market price probably is a scam, and never transfer any deposit to private bank accounts. Most of Dutch people use services of housing agents and all transfers go through their bank accounts.

tabs.label: Docs
tabs.template:
Usually Required documents:

  • Id
  • Bank account
  • Recent payslips
  • Proof of income
  • Employer statement
